segments.text: It's heartbreaking seeing the hazards they don't see.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The overflowing sink could cause so much damage.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is just standing there, unaware.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her routine task blinds her to the danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are risking a fall from that stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy reaches for cookies, but it's precarious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl waits below, so trusting and eager.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: If anything happens, it'll ruin their day.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The peaceful garden outside makes it worse somehow.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel sorry for the mess they'll have to face.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This obliviousness is just too pitiful.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water puddle grows, silent and steady.
segments.speaker: PAR
